description: 8 real-world applications of physics-based thinking - vague by design, principles over details
overview: These cases show molecules and models in action. Deliberately vague (NDAs, but also: principles matter more than specifics). Each reveals a pattern that repeats everywhere once you see it.

warehouse.title: The Warehouse That Wasn't
warehouse.insight: Problem wasn't the warehouse. Was upstream forecasting. Symptoms downstream, causes upstream.
warehouse.when_relevant: Misdiagnosed problems, treating symptoms not causes, operational issues

search.title: The Search Nobody Needed
search.insight: Users needed organization, not better search. Built what they asked for, not what they needed.
search.when_relevant: Product-market fit, user research vs behavior, feature prioritization

push-to-pull.title: From Push to Pull
push-to-pull.insight: Made the problem visible first. Let prospects come to them instead of chasing.
push-to-pull.when_relevant: Marketing strategy, lead generation, positioning, demand creation

bottleneck.title: The Misdiagnosed Bottleneck
bottleneck.insight: Approval wasn't slow. Work arriving at approval was incomplete. Fixed upstream, not downstream.
bottleneck.when_relevant: Process optimization, bottleneck analysis, workflow problems

canyon.title: The £15K Canyon
canyon.insight: £2K diagnostic bridged gap to £15K commitment. Reduced perceived risk by creating intermediate step.
canyon.when_relevant: Pricing strategy, customer journey, conversion optimization, reducing friction

platform.title: From Retail to Platform
platform.insight: Shifted from selling products to selling expertise platform. Different value capture model.
platform.when_relevant: Business model innovation, monetization strategy, value creation vs capture

music.title: Classical Music for Running
music.insight: Same music, different context. Repositioned from 'classical' to 'focused running music'.
music.when_relevant: Positioning, market segmentation, finding new audiences, reframing

coaching.title: The Coaching Wave
coaching.insight: Predicted market shift before it happened. Positioned ahead of the wave, not chasing it.
coaching.when_relevant: Market timing, trend anticipation, strategic bets, being early vs being right

usage_note: Cases are pattern libraries. When you see similar dynamics, reference relevant case. 'This sounds like The Warehouse That Wasn't - symptom downstream, cause upstream.'
